name: ListProfileMappings
description:
Retrieve all profile mappings in your Okta organization.

Use this tool to list all profile mappings available in your Okta organization. It supports pagination and can filter results by `sourceId` and/or `targetId`. This helps users understand how properties map between Okta user profiles and app user profiles.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor_after
parameters.description: Mapping ID for pagination cursor to fetch the next page of profile mappings.

value_schema.description: Mapping `id` that specifies the pagination cursor for the next page of mappings

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Number of profile mappings to return per page, used for pagination.

value_schema.description: Specifies the number of results per page

parameters.name: source_id
parameters.description: The user type or app instance ID acting as the source for the mappings. Filters results by this ID.

value_schema.description: The user type or app instance ID that acts as the source of expressions in a mapping. If this parameter is included, all returned mappings have this as their `source.id`.

parameters.name: target_id
parameters.description: The user type or app instance ID to be used as the target for expressions in a mapping. Filters returned mappings to have this as their `target.id`.

value_schema.description: The user type or app instance ID that acts as the target of expressions in a mapping. If this parameter is included, all returned mappings have this as their `target.id`.
